thread.title: Syrian Opposition Declaration to Exclude Evaluation of Russia’s Operations
thread.title_full: Syrian Opposition Declaration to Exclude Evaluation of Russia’s Operations - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Syrian Opposition Declaration to Exclude Evaluation of Russia’s Operations
text: An evaluation of Russia’s Air and Space Forces’ operations against the Islamic State terrorist group in Syria will not be included in the text of a declaration to be adopted at the end of the second conference of the Syrian opposition in the Kazakh capital of Astana, a source close to the negotiations told RIA Novosti Saturday. ...
